column1: # The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! successfully raided the camps of the besiegers, inflicting heavy casualties.
# All this localization will need to be improved

column2: The rainfall is unusually heavy in some of your lands.
Your lands are suffering from stormy weather.
Provinces in your demesne are experiencing a drought which is inflicting tremendous suffering
The winter is bringing heavy snowfall to parts of your demesne, harming your peasants  and hindering travel
Blizzards are afflicting provinces in your demesne.
Winter is not as harsh this year and the warmth is allowing some of your lands to flourish.
The winter is unusually cold this year, bringing much hardship and suffering amongst your people.
Spring is looking to be particularly warm.
The winter cold is lingering into spring this year.
This summer is turning out to be extremely hot.
Warm, pleasant autumn, coming right up.
The lack of rain in this province is causing a drought. Crops and livestock are dying and many people are suffering.
With so much rain falling in this region, many rivers are overflowing their banks and flooding nearby lands, destroying pasture and crops, and driving people from their homes.
Wind and rain is battering the coastlines in this province. The higher than normal swells are inundating low-lying areas with salty sea water and wreaking havoc on shipping.
This province is having a brutally hot summer.
This province is having a pleasant, mild summer.
